15:47 <vmassol> Ramona1: hi, re http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-12617 are you sure you use is configured to not show hidden docs  
15:51 <vmassol> Ramona1: just retested and it works fine here, could you list the steps you took so that I try to reproduce. But first please check your user  
15:52 <Ramona1> one moment. I will retest it  
15:56 <Ramona1> I retest it and indeed show hidden documents was on Yes. sorry for the noise  
15:56 <vmassol> do you have permissions to close the issue or shall I do it?  
15:57 <Ramona1> i don't have permissions. Can you please close it?  
15:58 <gsmeria> has joined #xwiki  
15:58 <gsmeria> has quit  
16:11 <vmassol> hmm I don't get it  
16:12 <vmassol> hey not me!  
16:12 <vmassol> I jsut opened this link in my browser: https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/blob/xwiki-platform-7.2/xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-administration/xwiki-platform-administration-ui/src/main/resources/XWiki/AdminSheet.xml  
16:15 <tmortagne> vmassol: you opened it as a branch and github automatically create it when you do that  
16:15 <tmortagne> tag is https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/tree/xwiki-platform-7.2  
16:15 <vmassol> ah yes my bad  
16:15 <vmassol> thanks  
16:15 <vmassol> grrrr  
16:15 <tmortagne> IMO github should return a 4.4  
16:15 <tmortagne> 404  
16:15 <vmassol> agreed  
16:15 <tmortagne> I don't see the point of this behavior  
16:19 <vmassol> tmortagne: do you know how to remove it, git push origin :xwiki-platform-7.2 doesn't work  
16:20 <vmassol> done  
16:20 <vmassol> git branch -rd origin/xwiki-platform-7.2 seems to have worked  
16:20 <tmortagne> AFAIK that's the right command, maybe you need to fetch first
